info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 9:11AM EDT until April 9 at 4:30AM EDT by NWS Charleston WV
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Ohio...
Ohio River At Greenup Lock affecting Greenup and Scioto Counties.
For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at Greenup Lock.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to early Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 54.0 feet, This will cause minor flooding of mainly low-lying areas. Backwater flooding starts on both sides of the river. At 56.0 feet, Several low lying areas flooded and backwater affected on both sides of the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 53.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 55.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 54.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 54.9 feet on 02/15/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 915 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
